page.title: 19SCAYNES HILL EVENTS
page.content: In 1924 a fire broke out at the combined bakery/grocery/house/Post Office. A horse drawn appliance from LINDFIELD attended. The cause of the fire was repairs being carried out to the bakery ovens: these were operated by the heat from faggots burning inside the oven. Scaynes Hill House was the site of an invasion by gypsies. This was actually a trick played on the occupants by a well disguised friend of the family... The Chief Whip of the government. Scaynes Hill House has just been sold by the owners, a family all of whom are doctors. The father is a brain surgeon;the mother a cancer doctor;the daughter a psychiatrist;the son a heart specialist and his wife Dr Alison.
